short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 🚀 "Fiverr PRO MAX" 🌟 - Your Ultimate Fiverr Companion! 💼💬🔔

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Fiverr experience like never before with our innovative Chrome extension! 🎉💪

⭐ Hide Sensitive Information 🙈
Worried about your sensitive data being displayed when sharing screen? Fear not! Fiverr PRO MAX lets you effortlessly hide your balance, orders, and chats from prying eyes. Keep your financial information and communication discreet, ensuring maximum privacy and peace of mind. 🔒📈💬

⭐ Never Miss a Chat🔔 
Stay on top of your game with our smart chat highlighting feature. Easily identify and prioritize messages that require your attention, ensuring you never miss a potential client or important inquiry. Seamlessly manage your communications and boost your response time, all in one place. 🚀💬🔍

⭐ Streamlined Review Experience 👏
Navigating through reviewer profiles can be time-consuming. But with Fiverr PRO MAX, we've made it a breeze! Instantly create clickable links on reviews, allowing you to explore reviewer profiles effortlessly. Gain valuable insights and build stronger connections to further grow your Fiverr business. 📝👥📈

⭐ Real-time Notifications 📣
Time is of the essence, and we understand that. Our extension keeps you informed in real-time with instant notifications for new messages and order updates. Be the first to know when new opportunities or changes arise, so you can act promptly and deliver exceptional service. 🕒🔔📨


Seize this opportunity to level up your Fiverr game. Embark on a journey of limitless possibilities with "Fiverr PRO MAX" now! 🌟🚀

⭐ Your data is secure🔒
We don't collect or send any data to our servers. Everything resides in your browser.

Enjoy ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Update 2.0.5:
-- Add notifications back, which doesn't interact with Fiverr APIs (completely safe)
-- Fixed user name links for updated reviews view. 

Update 2.0.2:
-- Fixed fiverr Neo hide functionality

Update 2.0.1:
-- Fixed bug that was causing lag in fiverr.com
-- Added ability to hide Fiverr Neo from chats sidebar
-- Removed notifications to stop interacting with Fiverr APIs
